welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Carroll, where small town charm meets Midwestern hospitality. Known for our beautiful parks and friendly community, we invite you to explore and experience all that Carroll has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Carroll Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Carroll Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport is the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
